org.jhove2.module.identify
Class DROIDWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.module.identify.DROIDWrapper

public class DROIDWrapper
extends Object

JHOVE2 wrapper around droid programming API, adapted for JHOVE2 from uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.Droid Please see the file DROID-LICENSE.txt in the JHOVE2 distribution for a complete statement of the BSD license rights governing the use of DROID source code.

Author:
smorrissey
